channel.title: Cyberpunk: 2077 on Gamefacts
channel.description: Recent content in Cyberpunk: 2077 on Gamefacts

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 devs tease announcement for September 4, 2025
item.description: Fans online speculate that an announcement is coming for Cyberpunk 2077 on September 4, 2025 following a tweet from the developers which roleplays as N.U.S.A (The New United States of America) who are seeking to recruit netrunners to help against a cyber security threat.
